mapper.insert: insert into exer_bbs values(exer_bbs_idx.nextval, '?', '한슬', #{ex_subject}, #{ex_content}, #{ex_cal}, sysdate, sysdate, '말머리', 0, #{ex_name}, 0)
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum,a.* from (select * from exer_bbs order by ex_idx desc) a) b where rnum >= #{start} and rnum <= #{end}
mapper.update: update exer_bbs set ex_subject=#{ex_subject}, ex_content=#{ex_content}, ex_cal=#{ex_cal}, ex_name=#{ex_name} where ex_idx=#{ex_idx}
update exer_bbs set ex_readnum=ex_readnum+1 where ex_idx=#{ex_idx}
mapper.select: select max(re_sunbun) from bbs_rebbs where re_idx=#{re_idx}
select * from bbs_rebbs where re_bbs_idx=#{re_bbs_idx} order by re_sunbun asc
select count(*) from bbs_rebbs where re_bbs_idx=#{re_bbs_idx}
select ex_sunbun from bbs_rebbs where ex_idx=#{ex_idx}
